input.label: hash
input.populatingSearch: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType=CrashSummary earliest=-7d | dedup reason,name | top hash,reason

input.label: Version
input.populatingSearch: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism hash=$hash$ MessageType=CrashDetailBreadcrumbs earliest=-7d| top app_version

input.label: Operating System
input.populatingSearch: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism hash=$hash$ MessageType=CrashDetailBreadcrumbs earliest=-7d| top os

input.label: Device
input.populatingSearch: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism hash=$hash$ MessageType=CrashDetailBreadcrumbs earliest=-7d| top device

table.title: Detailed Stacktrace
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType="CrashDetailStacktrace" hash=$hash$ | head 1 | rex "(?s)hash=(?<hash2>[a-z0-9]+)\s(?<data>.*)" | eval data2=replace(data,"(u\')|\'|\[|\]"," ") | eval data2=replace(data2,"(\\\t)"," ")| makemv delim="," data2 | chart list(data2) as DETAIL

table.title: Symbolized Stack Trace
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType=CrashDetailSymbolizedStacktrace hash=$hash$ | head 1 | rex "(?s)hash=(?<hash2>[a-z0-9]+)\s(?<data>.*)" | eval data2=replace(data,"(u\')|\'|\[|\]"," ") | eval data2=replace(data2,"(\\\t)"," ")| eval foo=len(data2) |eval data2=if(foo=4,"Not Available,0",data2)| makemv delim="," data2 | chart list(data2) as DETAIL

table.title: Breadcrumbs
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType=CrashDetailBreadcrumbs hash=$hash$ os="$os$" app_version="$app_version$" device="$device$" | head 1 | `clean_ctrl(_raw)` | rex "(?s)session=crashed_session\s(?<crashed>.*?)\]\]" | rex "(?s)session=current_session\s(?<current>.*?)\]\]" | rex "(?s)session=previous_session\s(?<previous>.*?)\]\]" |`clean_ctrl(crashed)` |`clean_json(crashed)` | eval crashed=replace(crashed,"],","") | eval crashed=replace(crashed,"\[","|") | eval crashed=split(crashed,"|") | eval crashed=mvappend("CRASHED SESSION",crashed) |`clean_ctrl(current)` |`clean_json(current)` | eval current =replace(current,"],","") | eval current =replace(current,"\[","|") | eval current =split(current,"|") | eval current = mvappend("CURRENT SESSION", current) |`clean_ctrl(previous)` |`clean_json(previous)` | eval previous =replace(previous,"],","") | eval previous =replace(previous,"\[","|") | eval previous =split(previous,"|") | eval previous = mvappend("PREVIOUS SESSION", previous) | eval crashed=mvappend(crashed,"----",current) | eval crashed=mvappend(crashed,"----",previous) | eval crashed=mvappend(crashed,"----")|eval os="OS: ".os | eval crashed=mvappend(crashed,os)|eval device="DEVICE: ".device| eval crashed=mvappend(crashed,device) |eval app_version="APP VERSION: ".app_version| eval crashed=mvappend(crashed, app_version)|chart list(crashed) as DETAIL

table.title: Unique Session Counts ByVersion
table.searchString: * index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism "hash=$hash$" MessageType="CrashDetailUniqueSessionCountsByVersion" |head 1|`json_data_mv`| rename VAR AS "Version", VAL AS "SessionCount" | table Version,SessionCount

table.title: Session Counts by Version
table.searchString: * index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType="CrashDetailSessionCountsByVersion" hash=$hash$ |head 1|`json_data_mv`| rename VAR AS "Version", VAL AS "SessionCount" | table Version,SessionCount

table.title: Users Affected - click username for more detail
table.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType="CrashDiagsAffectedUser" hash=$hash$ | dedup username| table username,userhash

map.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism CrashDiagsGeo "hash=$hash$" | dedup city | geostats latfield=lat longfield=lon list(crashes) AS crashes

chart.title: Crashes By Carrier
chart.searchString: * index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType=CrashDiagsDiscrete "hash=$hash$" | head 1| `discrete_vars`| search VAR=carrier* |rex field=VAR "(?<GROUP>.*:)?(?<VARX>.*)"| eval Carrier=VARX| eval Carrier=replace(Carrier,"\%26","&") | chart list(VAL) AS Percentage by Carrier

table.title: Crashes by System Version
table.searchString: * index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType=CrashDiagsDiscrete "hash=$hash$" | head 1 | rex "hash=[0-9a-f]*(?<DATA>.*)$" | rex field=DATA max_match=50 "\"(?<var>.*?)\"\=\"(?<val>.*?)\"" | eval fields=mvzip(var,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "(?<VAR>.*),(?<VAL>\d+)" | rex field=VAR "(?<GROUP>.*:)?(?<VARX>.*)" | search GROUP = "system_version:" | rename VARX as Version, VAL as Crashes | table Version, Crashes

table.title: Discrete Groups Available for Report (Click for detail)
table.searchString: * index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType=CrashDiagsDiscrete "hash=$hash$" | head 1| `discrete_vars`| rex field=VAR "(?<GROUP>.*:)?(?<VARX>.*)"| eval GROUP=replace(GROUP,"\:","") | dedup GROUP | table GROUP

chart.title: Disk Stats (Continuous Diags)
chart.searchString: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType=CrashDiagsContinuous "hash=$hash$"| head 30| rex "hash=[0-9a-f]*(?<DATA>.*)$" | rex field=DATA max_match=50 "(?<var>.*?)\=\"(?<val>.*?)\"" | eval pair=var."=".val | mvexpand pair | eval disk_space_free_average=replace(disk_space_free_average,"MB","")| eval disk_space_free_max=replace(disk_space_free_max,"MB","")| eval disk_space_free_min=replace(disk_space_free_min,"MB","") |chart max(disk_space_free_max) AS MaxFree, max(disk_space_free_min) as MinFree, max(disk_space_free_average) as AvgFree by _time

chart.title: Top Breadcrumb Actions
chart.searchString: * index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType=CrashDetailBreadcrumbs hash=$hash$ os="$os$" app_version="$app_version$" device="$device$" | head 100 | eval _raw=replace(_raw,"\t|\n","") | rex "(?s)session=crashed_session\s(?<crashed>.*?)\]\]" | rex "(?s)session=current_session\s(?<current>.*?)\]\]" | rex "(?s)session=previous_session\s(?<previous>.*?)\]\]" | eval crashed=replace(crashed,"\t|\n","") | eval crashed = replace(crashed,"(\[\[)|(\]\])|(u\')|\'","") | eval crashed=replace(crashed,"],","") | eval crashed=replace(crashed,"\[","|") | eval crashed=split(crashed,"|") |mvexpand crashed| rex field=crashed "(?<action>.*?),(?<adata>.*)" | top action

chart.title: Top Breadcrumb Post Items
chart.searchString: * index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism MessageType=CrashDetailBreadcrumbs hash=$hash$ os="$os$" app_version="$app_version$" device="$device$" | head 100 | eval _raw=replace(_raw,"\t|\n","") | rex "(?s)session=crashed_session\s(?<crashed>.*?)\]\]" | rex "(?s)session=current_session\s(?<current>.*?)\]\]" | rex "(?s)session=previous_session\s(?<previous>.*?)\]\]" | eval crashed=replace(crashed,"\t|\n","") | eval crashed = replace(crashed,"(\[\[)|(\]\])|(u\')|\'","") | eval crashed=replace(crashed,"],","") | eval crashed=replace(crashed,"\[","|") | eval crashed=split(crashed,"|") |mvexpand crashed| rex field=crashed "(?<action>.*?),(?<adata>.*)" | search action="POST" | rex field=adata "(?<postitem>.*?),(?<postdata>.*)" |top postitem
